roleset.name: (cause to) break down, decay
roleset.note: Frame file created by Arrick based on ebc; nominal 'decomposition' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls entity_specific_cos-45.5

example.name: nominal rel: decomposition
example.text: Mites are involved in the decomposition of animal carcases and human corpses at every stage.
example.arg: of animal carcases and human corpses
